steps.title: Wear mint and black pieces together for chic contrast.
steps.content: Wear mint and black pieces together for chic contrast. Mint is very eye-catching, so pairing mint with black pieces can help tone down the brightness and create a sharp, stylish contrast that’s easy to wear. If you’re new to mint, wearing it with black is a great way to incorporate the color into your wardrobe. [1] X Research source For example, wear a mint T-shirt with a pair of black skinny jeans for a fresh, casual vibe. Wear a tailored black blazer over a mint blouse to create elegant contrast.

steps.title: Mix and match other pastel shades with mint for a delicate look.
steps.content: Mix and match other pastel shades with mint for a delicate look. Mint coordinates easily with other pastel colors and the overall effect is sweet and soft. If you love mixing it up when it comes to colors, try wearing mint with pastels like lavender, soft pink, baby blue, or light yellow. This approach is particularly popular in the spring. [2] X Expert Source Bethany Brenneman Color Analysis Expert & Professional Makeup Artist Expert Interview. 21 February 2025. [3] X Research source For example, wear a mint scarf with a pink T-shirt and baby blue jeans. Try a fitted yellow polo with a lavender skirt and a pair of mint-colored flats. [4] X Expert Source Neepa Sikdar Personal Stylist Expert Interview. 11 February 2022.

steps.title: Pair mint with navy pieces for a combo that flatters almost everyone.
steps.content: Pair mint with navy pieces for a combo that flatters almost everyone. Navy is a neutral color that you can easily work into your wardrobe and it works really well with mint. If you aren’t sure where to start and wearing mint with black feels a bit too stark, try navy instead. [5] X Research source For instance, wear a mint blouse with a navy blue pencil skirt and a pair of navy flats for a simple work-ready outfit. Try wearing a mint cardigan over a fitted navy blue shirt for a soft, casual look.

steps.title: Wear different minty shades together for a fun, fresh look.
steps.content: Wear different minty shades together for a fun, fresh look. If you want to go with a mint on mint look, different shades pair nicely with one another. Just be sure to choose pieces that are different shades to create some contrast. Wearing the exact same shade of mint from head to toe can look a little matchy-matchy. [6] X Research source For example, wear a pastel sea foam top with shorts in a brighter mint shade for a cute look.

steps.title: Try a mint T-shirt with light wash skinny jeans for an easy-to-wear outfit.
steps.content: Try a mint T-shirt with light wash skinny jeans for an easy-to-wear outfit. Light wash jeans are typically soft blue and this color complements pastel mint shades nicely! A soft, mint-colored T-shirt with light wash skinny jeans creates a stylish, laid back vibe. [7] X Research source If you aren’t into skinny jeans, light wash jeans in a straight cut or boyfriend cut will look great, too. Finish your outfit with a pair of white tennis shoes or flats.

steps.title: Wear a white T-shirt with mint jeans for a simple, laid back look.
steps.content: Wear a white T-shirt with mint jeans for a simple, laid back look. Mint jeans are super cute, but not everyone is comfortable wearing such eye-catching pants! Topping them with a simple white T-shirt can help to tone down the overall look and make it more accessible. [8] X Expert Source Neepa Sikdar Personal Stylist Expert Interview. 11 February 2022. If you’re new to mint, this approach might appeal to you. [9] X Research source White canvas slip-ons or white sandals are perfect to complete this outfit.

steps.title: Go with mint colored shorts and a bright top for a fun summer look.
steps.content: Go with mint colored shorts and a bright top for a fun summer look. If you like a bolder look and want to make a splash, wear mint denim shorts with a bright top like yellow or orange. For example, wear mint shorts with a bright pink tank top or a bold orange T-shirt for a cute look on a casual summer day. [10] X Research source Complete your outfit with neutral colored shoes, like beige or navy flip-flops.

steps.title: Pair a mint chiffon skirt with a delicate white tank top for a flirty outfit.
steps.content: Pair a mint chiffon skirt with a delicate white tank top for a flirty outfit. A mint skirt is a stylish look that can really turn heads! A white tank or camisole will soften the look. [11] X Expert Source Neepa Sikdar Personal Stylist Expert Interview. 11 February 2022. This is a pretty look for a summer picnic, afternoon barbeque, or casual date. [12] X Research source If you want to show a little more skin, try a white tube top or crop top with your mint skirt.

steps.title: Go with a mint dress shirt with dark trousers for a work-ready look.
steps.content: Go with a mint dress shirt with dark trousers for a work-ready look. Black or navy blue dress pants look stylish and can tone down the boldness of your shirt. Complete the outfit with a blazer or cardigan that matches your pants and a pair of black penny loafers for a day at the office. [13] X Research source Too much mint can be overwhelming in a traditional office setting, so be sure to pair it with neutrals to make the look more accessible.

steps.title: Wear tailored mint trousers with a white button-down at the office.
steps.content: Wear tailored mint trousers with a white button-down at the office. A pair of well-fitting mint trousers can look very stylish at the office. The key is to pair them with a simple white top, like a button-down dress shirt, to keep your overall look professional. [14] X Research source Finish the outfit with a navy blue blazer and navy blue pumps or loafers.

steps.title: Stand out in a mint-colored formal or semi-formal dress.
steps.content: Stand out in a mint-colored formal or semi-formal dress. Mint can be a gorgeous choice if you’re on the hunt for a dress to wear to prom or another formal event. If you’re trying to sort out your wedding color scheme, consider throwing mint into the mix! Mint bridesmaid dresses pair beautifully with the bride’s white wedding dress. [15] X Research source Try on the dress and make sure the mint shade works well with your skin tone before making a purchase. If you aren’t sure, ask a friend or family member for their opinion!

steps.title: Add a pop of color to a neutral suit with a mint-colored neck tie.
steps.content: Add a pop of color to a neutral suit with a mint-colored neck tie. If your workplace is pretty formal but you still want to give mint a try, consider pairing a mint-colored neck tie with a neutral suit. Wear a white button-down dress shirt under the suit jacket to pull the look together. [16] X Research source For example, a black, brown, or navy suit would pair easily with a mint tie.
